Text.text: {p}{f 0}{b}Follow the steps below to upgrade your license.{n}{y 30}• In this window{/b}{n}1. Click Generate Client Request to create the{n} upgrade request.{n}2. Click Copy Client Request to copy the{n} request to clipboard.{n}{y 30}{b}• On a computer with Internet access{/b}{n}3. Prepare the client request (from step 2) in{n} clipboard.{n}4. Open the URL:{n}{a https://www.appeon.com/license/get/activation-code?type=upgrade}{c #001472D0}https://www.appeon.com/license/get/activation-code?type=upgrade{/a}{/c}{n}5. Follow the instructions on the webpage to get the{n} server response.{n}{y 30}{b}• Back to this window{/b}{n}6. Prepare the server response (from step 5) in{n} clipboard, and click Paste Server Response to{n} paste it here.{n}7. Click the Upgrade button.{/f}{/p}
